long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Profile Manager Pro

Effortlessly Manage Multiple Profiles for Your Favorite Websites

Description:

Profile Manager Pro is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to streamline your online experience by allowing you to manage multiple profiles for any website seamlessly. Whether you juggle multiple accounts for work, personal use, or testing, this extension provides a convenient way to switch between profiles without the hassle of logging in and out repeatedly.

Key Features:

Multiple Profile Management:

Save Multiple Profiles: Create and save multiple profiles for any website, each with its own set of cookies.
Instant Switching: Switch between profiles instantly without logging out and back in.
Easy Deletion: Delete profiles you no longer need with a simple click.
Cookie Handling:

Save Current Session: Save the current session's cookies as a new profile.
Load Saved Sessions: Load saved cookies to restore a profile's session instantly.
Clear Cookies: Clear cookies for the current domain to log out or reset the session.
Global Cookie Actions:

Export Cookies: Export cookies from the current session to a JSON file for backup or sharing.
Import Cookies: Import cookies from a file to restore a session or share profiles.
Backup & Restore Profiles: Backup all or selected profiles and restore them on any device.
User-Friendly Interface:

Intuitive Design: Clean and straightforward layout for easy navigation.
Search Functionality: Quickly find websites or profiles using the search bar.
Toggle View: Choose to display all saved websites or only the current one.
Customization & Settings:

Display Options: Toggle between showing all websites or just the current domain.
Preference Settings: Enable or disable features based on your personal preferences.
Why Install Profile Manager Pro?

Save Time and Increase Productivity:

Eliminate the need to log in and out repeatedly when switching accounts.
Quickly switch between multiple accounts for the same website.
Simplify Account Management:

Manage multiple social media, email, or any other accounts with ease.
Ideal for professionals, testers, or anyone who uses multiple accounts.
Enhance Privacy and Security:

Clear cookies to ensure your session data is removed.
All data is stored locally; nothing is shared externally.
Backup and Transfer Profiles:

Export your profiles to back them up or transfer them to another device.
Import profiles to quickly set up your accounts on a new browser.
How It Works:

Profile Manager Pro operates by saving and restoring cookies associated with different profiles for a website. When you save a profile, the extension stores the session cookies for the current domain, allowing you to reload them later. This process ensures that each profile maintains its unique session, enabling instant switching between accounts without the need to log out and back in.

Getting Started:

Install the Extension:

Add Profile Manager Pro to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
Save a Profile:

Navigate to the website you want to manage.
Open the extension and enter a name for your new profile.
Click "Save" to store the current session.
Switch Profiles:

Open the extension and select the profile you wish to load.
Click "Load" to switch to the selected profile instantly.
Manage Cookies:

Use the "Clear Cookies" button to remove all cookies for the current domain.
Export or import cookies using the provided options for backup or sharing.
User-Friendly Interface:

Header Section:

Displays the extension name and logo for easy identification.
Accessible buttons for quick actions.
Global Cookie Actions Toolbar:

Clear Cookies: Remove all cookies for the current domain.
Export Cookies: Save current session cookies to a file.
Import Cookies: Load cookies from a file to restore a session.
Search Bar:

Quickly find websites or profiles by typing in the search field.
Websites and Profiles List:

Displays a list of websites with saved profiles.
Expand a website to view, add, load, or delete profiles.
Backup & Restore Section:

Export All: Backup all profiles to a file.
Export Selected: Choose specific profiles to export.
Import: Restore profiles from a backup file.
Settings Section:

Show All Websites Toggle: Choose to display all websites or only the current one.
Privacy and Security:

Local Storage Only:

All profiles and cookies are stored locally on your device.
No data is transmitted externally, ensuring your privacy.
Permissions Required:

Cookies Access: To save and load profiles by managing cookies.
Storage Access: To store your profiles and settings.
Tabs Access: To reload the page when profiles are loaded or cookies are cleared.

Upgrade Your Browsing Experience with Profile Manager Pro Today!

Simplify your online life by managing multiple profiles effortlessly. Install Profile Manager Pro and take control of your accounts like never before.

Note:

Profile Manager Pro respects your privacy and operates entirely within your browser. It does not collect or transmit any personal data. All profiles and cookies are securely stored on your device.

Changelog:

Version 1.1:
Improved user interface for better usability.
Added global cookie actions for enhanced cookie management.
Implemented backup and restore functionality for profiles.
Introduced settings toggle to display all websites or only the current domain.
Enhanced performance and fixed minor bugs.
FAQs:

Q: Can I use this extension to manage profiles on any website?

A: Yes, Profile Manager Pro works with any website that uses cookies for session management.

Q: Is my data safe when using this extension?

A: Absolutely. All data is stored locally on your device, and nothing is transmitted externally.

Q: How do I transfer my profiles to another computer?

A: Use the "Export All" feature to save your profiles to a file, then import them on the other device using the "Import" option.

Q: What happens when I clear cookies for a domain?

A: Clearing cookies will log you out of that website, removing session data and requiring you to log in again if needed.

Q: Does this extension work with incognito mode?

A: You need to enable the extension in incognito mode from the Chrome extensions settings for it to work.

Permissions Explanation:

Cookies:

Required to read and modify cookies for saving and loading profiles.
Storage:

Needed to store your profiles and settings within the extension.

Feedback and Ratings:

If you enjoy using Profile Manager Pro, please consider leaving a positive review on the Chrome Web Store. Your support helps us continue improving the extension.

Disclaimer:

Profile Manager Pro is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. The developers are not responsible for any loss or issues arising from the use of this extension. Always ensure you have backups of important data.

Get Started Now!

Enhance your browsing efficiency and manage your online profiles with ease. Click "Add to Chrome" to install Profile Manager Pro and transform the way you handle multiple accounts.

Thank you for choosing Profile Manager Pro!
